did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.physloc: THIS COLLECTION IS LOCATED AT THE STATE RECORDS CENTER. CONTACT ARCHIVES RESEARCH SERVICES FOR ACCESS INFORMATION, DIRECTIONS, AND HOURS.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: THIS COLLECTION IS LOCATED AT THE STATE RECORDS CENTER. CONTACT ARCHIVES RESEARCH SERVICES FOR ACCESS INFORMATION, DIRECTIONS, AND HOURS.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: L. Karen Darner Legislative Papers, 1990-2004. Accession 51365. Personal papers collection, The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Virginia.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Gift of L. Karen Darner, Arlington, Virginia, 24 July 2014.
